{{also|失禮}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-see|失禮}}

----

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しつ|れい|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しつれい}} compound {{m|zh|失禮|tr=syit lej<sup>X</sup>|lit=lose, loss + propriety}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''sit-lé''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|しつれい|acc=2|dev=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|しつれい|kyu=失禮}}

# [[rude]], [[impolite]], [[ill-mannered]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''失礼'''な人。|'''しつれい''' な ひと。|A '''rude''' person.}}
#: {{ja-usex|そういう言い方は'''失礼'''だ。|そう いう い.いかた は '''しつれい''' だ。|It's '''impolite''' to say it like that.}}
#: {{ja-usex|'''失礼'''ですが。|'''しつれい''' です が。|It's a '''rudeness''', but... → I don't mean to be '''rude''', but...}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|無礼|ぶれい}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しつれい|kyu=失禮}}

# [[rudeness]], [[impoliteness]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''失礼'''ですが。|'''しつれい''' です が。|It's a '''rudeness''', but... → I don't mean to be '''rude''', but...}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|無礼|ぶれい}}

===Interjection===
{{ja-pos|interjection|しつれい|kyu=失禮}}

# [[I'm sorry]], [[excuse me]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|しつれい|kyu=失禮}}

# to be [[rude]], to [[do]] something [[rude]]

====Usage notes====
Used idiomatically to mean {{m|en|excuse me}} or {{m|en|I'm sorry}}.  Examples include:
: {{ja-usex|失礼しました。|しつれい しました。|I was '''rude''' → '''I'm sorry'''. {{qualifier|in reference to a past action}}}}
: {{ja-usex|では、'''失礼'''します。|で は、 '''しつれい''' します。|I will be '''rude''' → '''Excuse me''' {{qualifier|said at the end of a phone call just before hanging up}}}}
: {{ja-usex|お先に'''失礼'''します。|お-さき に '''しつれい''' します。|I will be '''rude''' by doing something first → '''Excuse me''', I'm leaving now. {{qualifier|before other people leave}}}}

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|しつれい}}
